```{r}
getwd()
```

```{r}
df <- data.frame(numtop = c(20, 40, 5, 5, 10, 5, 10, 20), 
                 numpasses = as.factor(c(25, 50, 10, 5, 25, 25, 25, 25)),
                 token = c("textacy", "textacy", "textacy", "textacy", "textacy", "phrasemachine", "phrasemachine",  "phrasemachine"), 
                 real = c(1452, NaN, 114, 109, 189, 506, 417, 462)
                 )
```

try and plot y axis = real
x axis = numtop
shape = token 
colour = numpasses

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
plot <- ggplot(df, aes(x=numtop, y=real, shape=numpasses, color = token, size = 3)) + geom_point() + labs(x = "Number of topics", y = "Clock time taken (real)")

ggsave(filename="LDA_realtime.png", plot=plot)
```
